title: Computer Freezing
body: Yesterday, whenever I would get into a game in League, (Custom, ranked, Norms, Blind, ANYTHING), my entire computer would freeze, and would constantly replay the last sound made in a sped up super fast loop. There is nothing I can do except do a hard reset, and it won't stop happening. This problem was spontaneous and out of nowhere. I have no viruses and nothing changed that would've affected League, so I do not understand why it's happening. Any Advice, support, troubleshooting, etc is greatly appreciated.

> I have the same problem - once the champs loading screen finishes and I'm "deployed" into the game, it just freezes and the last second of sound/music plays in a fast loop. My whole computer freezes as well so I have no choice but to do a hard reset. One game I was able to get back in and play but after 5-10 mins into the match it froze again so I had to reset. I then got a warning for abandoning the match! :( 
> 
> I just wanna play and I know it can't be my PC cause it's new.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

basically same thing with me, my computer is practically brand new. It only happened after the new patch update, I've tried re-installing league but it didn't work. please help

I've seen quite a bit of reports about the freezing and weird noise from some players, and the culprit may be an xbox game bar issue after a windows 10 update.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you still have any issues.
